snippet: description="Use of insecure randomness (random.random() for security-sensitive use)",
rule_desc: Use of insecure randomness (random.random() for security-sensitive use)
suggestion: Use secrets module or os.urandom for cryptographic randomness.

rule_desc: Use of HTTP (not HTTPS) in URLs
suggestion: Prefer HTTPS URLs; avoid sending secrets over HTTP.

rule_desc: Use of insecure randomness (random.random() for security-sensitive use)
suggestion: Use secrets module or os.urandom for cryptographic randomness.
Avoid untrusted pickle data; use safer serialization formats (JSON).
Avoid eval/exec; use safer parsing or literal_eval.
Use parameterized queries / prepared statements instead of string concatenation.

snippet: description="HTTP request with verify=False (insecure TLS validation)",
rule_desc: HTTP request with verify=False (insecure TLS validation)
suggestion: Do not disable TLS verification in production.
Avoid eval/exec; use safer parsing or literal_eval.
